titles.title: A bill to transfer funds out of certain foreign assistance accounts for prison construction purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.

term.name: Federal aid to law enforcement agencies

bill.summary: 4/10/1987--Introduced. Transfers certain foreign assistance funds allocated to countries which the Secretary of State certifies as having failed to make adequate progress in reducing illegal narcotics production to the Attorney General for: (1) prison construction; and (2) making grants for drug law enforcement programs.
